text: Ara tomara uttama pantha chara kitabidera sathe bitarka karabe na [1], tabe tadera sathe karate para, yara tadera sathe yuluma kareche [2]. Ara tomara bala, 'amadera prati ebam tomadera prati ya nayila hayeche, tate amara imana enechi. Ara amadera ilah o tomadera ilah to eka'i. Ara amara tamra'i prati atmasamarpanakari [3] |â€™
